title: MLLMs as Agent Models

definitions.Level 2: Using MLLM to reason to act

summary: The slide discusses two levels of using MLLM as agent models. Level 1 involves using MLLM to act, while Level 2 involves using MLLM to reason to act. The slide also includes a diagram illustrating the relationship between action, observation, memory, and tool use in the context of MLLM.
